entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Wingham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:44 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 5:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: -8.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -10.2°C
Wind: SW 18 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.summary: Clearing. High plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.summary: Clear. Windy. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
